attributes.action: Create a law banning lorries and HGVs from leaving the slow lane of any road with 2 or more lanes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It's quite self explanatory really.  The most congestion on our roads outside of roadworks and accidents is caused by lorries etc overtaking each other and causing tailbacks.  

I would like to see a law to ban HGVs, lorries and other similar vehicles from leaving the slow lane of any road unless it is dangerous or impossible to do otherwise.

I can't be alone on this one.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
